coreAttributes.name: pistol crossbow
coreAttributes.description: Consisting of a bow-like assembly mounted horizontally on a pistol-shaped frame, this small crossbow can easily be wielded in one hand. When the string is drawn back, an arcane essence is extracted from the wielder and converted into an ethereal bolt, ready to be fired at a target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] pistol crossbow, ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] pistol crossbow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with a powerful arcane bolt!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] pistol crossbow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a powerful blast of arcane energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] pistol crossbow, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] pistol crossbow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, letting out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] pistol crossbow and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
